content: worked from the bottom upwards merry sweater is worked in the round after finishing the pretty textured hem sections the body is divided at the armhole point meaning that it s very easy to lengthen or shorten your project for personalisation and then joined at the shoulders using the 3 needle bind off method the sleeves are picked-up and knitted downwards in the round starting with an eye-catching textured detail before resuming the therapeutic rhythm of stockinette stitch the tex- tured neckband is also worked in the round meaning that this is a seam-free / stress-free / cast-off-and- wear project **sizes ** xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl **bust circumference to fit ** 85 90 95 100 105 110 115 120 cm / 34 36 38 40 42 44 46 48 **bust circumference cardigan ** 95 5 101 106 5 112 117 5 122 5 128 133 5 cm / 37 5 39 75 42 44 46 25 48 25 50 5 52 5 **positive ease ** 10-13 cm / 4-5
